# Solution 3:
a, b, x = map(int, input().split())
print(a, b, x)
c = []
for i in range(0, a):
    c.append(0)
for i in range(0, b):
    c.append(1)
print(c)
for i in range(0, x):
    c[i], c[i+1] = c[i+1], c[i]
print(c)
c = ''.join(str(i) for i in c)
print(c)
